data.name: PSR0005
data.value: PSR0005: The {0} '{1}' is obsolete.
data.comment: Occurs when a resource is used that has been flagged as obsolete.

data.name: ArgumentFormatInvalid
data.value: The arguments for '{0}' are not in the expected format or type.

data.name: ArgumentInvalidBoolean
data.value: The argument '{0}' for '{1}' is not a valid boolean.

data.name: ArgumentInvalidInteger
data.value: The argument '{0}' for '{1}' is not a valid integer.

data.name: ArgumentInvalidString
data.value: The argument '{0}' for '{1}' is not a valid string.

data.name: ArgumentsOutOfRange
data.value: The number of arguments '{1}' is not within the allowed range for '{0}'.

data.name: BaselineObsolete
data.value: The baseline '{0}' is obsolete. Consider switching to an alternative baseline.
data.comment: Occurs when a baseline is used that has been flagged as obsolete.

data.name: ConstrainedTargetBinding
data.value: Binding functions are not supported in this language mode.

data.name: DebugPropertyObsolete
data.value: {0}: The property '${1}.{2}' is obsolete and will be removed in the next major version.

data.name: DebugTargetIfMismatch
data.value: Target failed If precondition

data.name: DebugTargetTypeMismatch
data.value: Target failed Type precondition

data.name: DebugTargetRuleMismatch
data.value: Target failed Rule precondition

data.name: DependencyCircularReference
data.value: A circular rule dependency was detected. The rule '{0}' depends on '{1}' which also depend on '{0}'.
data.comment: Occurs when rules interdepend on each other.

data.name: DependencyNotFound
data.value: The dependency '{0}' for '{1}' could not be found. Check that the rule is defined in a .Rule.ps1 file within the search path.
data.comment: Occurs when a rule dependency is not discovered.

data.name: DuplicateResourceId
data.value: The resource '{0}' is using a duplicate resource identifier. A resource with the identifier '{1}' already exists. Each resource must have a unique name, ref, and aliases. See https://aka.ms/ps-rule/naming for guidance on naming within PSRule.
data.comment: Occurs when the same resource id is used.

data.name: DuplicateRuleName
data.value: A rule with the same name '{0}' already exists.
data.comment: Occurs when the same rule name is used.

data.name: ErrorDetailMessage
data.value: {0} : Reported '{1}'. At {2}:{3} char:{4}

data.name: ErrorPipelineException
data.value: One or more errors occured.

data.name: ExistsTrue
data.value: Exists: {0}

data.name: FileSourceType
data.value: File

data.name: ExpressionInvalid
data.value: Failed to parse expression. The expression may not be valid. Expression: "{0}"

data.name: FoundModules
data.value: [PSRule][D] -- Found {0} PSRule module(s)

data.name: FunctionNotFound
data.value: The function "{0}" was not found.

data.name: IndexInvalid
data.value: The language expression index '{0}' is not valid for the object.

data.name: InvalidErrorAction
data.value: An invalid ErrorAction ({0}) was specified for rule at {1}. Ignore | Stop are supported.

data.name: InvalidRuleNesting
data.value: Rule nesting was detected for rule at {0}. Rules must not be nested.
data.comment: Occurs when a rule is nested in another rule.

data.name: InvalidRuleResult
data.value: An invalid rule result was returned for {0}. Conditions must return boolean $True or $False.

data.name: KeywordConditionScope
data.value: The keyword '{0}' can only be used within a Rule block.

data.name: KeywordRuleScope
data.value: The keyword '{0}' can only be used within a Rule block or script precondition.

data.name: KeywordSourceScope
data.value: The keyword '{0}' can not be nested in a Rule block.

data.name: LaunchBrowser
data.value: Please open your browser to the following location: {0}

data.name: MatchSingleName
data.value: Wildcard match requires exactly one name.

data.name: MatchTrue
data.value: Matches: {0}

data.name: ObjectNotProcessed
data.value: Target object '{0}' has not been processed because no matching rules were found.

data.name: OptionsNotFound
data.value: Options file does not exist.
data.comment: Occurs when explicit path to a YAML file is specified and doesn't exist.

data.value: # Source: {0}

data.value: The language expression property '{0}' doesn't exist.

data.value: The {0} resource '{1}' is currently referencing '{2}' using the alias '{3}'. Consider updating the reference to use name or id directly.

data.name: AliasSuppression
data.value: Suppression for the rule '{0}' was configured using the alias '{1}'. Consider updating the suppression to use the name or id directly.

data.name: InvalidResourceName
data.value: The resource name '{0}' is not valid at {1}. Each resource name must be between 3-128 characters in length, must start and end with a letter or number, and only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, dots, or underscores. See https://aka.ms/ps-rule/naming for more information.
